reviewText: After discovering Thalia back in '97, I made an effort to catch all of her wonderfully sexy videos and preserve them on tape. Unfortunately, after years of use, they got to be pretty bad looking, not to mention that they were scattered all over the place: some grouped together, others hidden in commercial breaks. So I am grateful that Thalia (her people?) deigned to have this collection released on DVD.And what a collection it is. Starting at 1995--the year Thalia moved to EMI, as this collection eschews the embarrassing early '90s--the videos continue until the 2002 album era. Fellow reviewers have expressed anger at 'It's My Party'--the english version of Arrasando--not being included. Obviously, if in existence, it should have been included, for posterity alone. I can only conclude that Thalia considers it a horrible song--as did many others--and is hoping fans have forgotten it.Twenty dollars for a bunch of music videos is kind of steep, but this collection is unique: not only because it contains so many good songs, but because it is a snapshot, capturing a highly sexual time period in Thalia's long history. To clarify: her videos--while not quite pushing the limits of good taste as Gloria Trevi might--were a sensation, not only due to her, many times, erotic dance moves, but because of Thalia herself. A sweet woman, unique among a bunch of augmented supermodel wannabes, she thought nothing of showing off her body in a variety of revealing outfits, sending her fans (male and female) into a lustful hypnotism. But as time pressed on she began to tone it down, just a bit at first, but it was disheartening. As 2003 loomed, she was done. Thalia became a soccermom (albeit a really hot one.) There's no explaining it: maybe age calmed her down, or her new marriage, but her sexy days were over, making this a hot, and sad, collection.Highly recommended.
summary: Get rid of your tapes--DVD is here!
Title: N/A

reviewText: This is an amazing collection of all her videos since she started with EMI. If you are a fan you must have this in your collection, If you are not, you must still have this in your collection as it is one of a kind. Never before had her videos been available to purchase, and this is a great compilation. It would have been even better though if they added also the video for Anastasia that she did for that FOX Animated movie with same name, and videos from her real Beginnings like Un Pacto Entre Los Dos. The previous reviews that were done before the release date have a bit of incorrect information. I did not see anywhere on the DVD a section of the making of the videos as they list, Mujer Latina Remix is not included either. So go out and buy this one of a kind collection of Thalia's Videos, you'll really be glad you did.

reviewText: Don't know how many versions of this DVD are out there? My DVD (UPC # 724349098794) has 16 videos listed on the back cover - HOWEVER there are an additional 4 videos (marked below with a ?) on the DVD itself, and which can be seen and accessed on the main menu. This gives the DVD (or mine at least) 20 videos in total.The extras include a photo gallery, discography and a short biography.1. Piel Morena2. Gracias A Dios3. Amándote?. Nandito Ako4. Por Amor5. Amor A La Mexicana6. Mujer Latina7. Arrasando8. Regresa A Mi9. Entre El Mar Y Una Estrella10. Reencarnación11. Amor A La Mexicana (Emilio Banda Remix)12. Tú Y Yo13. No Me Enseñaste14. reviewText: I loved Selena's music and videos.I heard about her dying when I was at Tower records.I immediately wanted to listen to her music cuz I had a feeling i'd love it and have never stopped loving her music and videos.I even saw her bro and sister perform at the fair years after her death.Awesome! R.I.P Selena.
